org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rest

类 RESTServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rest.RESTServer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Constants

    @InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate(value="Tools")
public class RESTServer
extends Object
implements Constants
    Main class for launching REST gateway as a servlet hosted by Jetty.

    The following options are supported:

    • -p --port : service port
    • -ro --readonly : server mode

      • getTrimmedStringList

        private static List<String> getTrimmedStringList(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                                 String name,
                                                 String defaultValue)
        Returns a list of strings from a comma-delimited configuration value.
        参数:
        conf - configuration to check
        name - configuration property name
        defaultValue - default value if no value found for name
        返回:
        list of strings from comma-delimited configuration value, or an empty list if not found
